name: Bad Steel Racing
description: Civilization Barmalleey conducting an invasion on an enemy planet. A few troops managed to break through the echeloned space defense of the enemy. But the most difficult is yet to come. On the planet they are waiting for hordes of huge and terrible creatures that have occupied defensive lines and are ready to fight to the end. Riding the combat transport platform, the player will have to go on a long journey through the alien terrain on the background of the beautiful scenery of the ruins of the local cities, join the battle on the side of the Barmalleys and free up the territory of destroying enemy creatures and strengthening them. Crush the mighty giants! Destroy technological robots! Earn money! And improve your car and skills for more successful raids.
